subject: Medicine
title: Dopamine and Reward
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Dopamine and Reward.

hook.text: Placebos tap into the brain's built-in reward system.

buildup.text: When you expect improvement, dopamine levels rise.

discovery.text: Dopamine is the same chemical triggered by food and music.

twist.text: Parkinson's patients given placebos show real dopamine spikes.

climax.text: Their motor symptoms temporarily improve from belief alone.

punchline.text: Hope is literally a chemical event.

quiz.question: What neurotransmitter increases when patients expect a placebo to work?
